short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a playful cat as your assistant while browsing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Paws and whiskers, greetings, human! 😺 I'm Crit the Cat, with fur as black as midnight.

Here’s my purrfect toolkit:
- Read web pages and answer questions about them
- Do anything that ChatGPT can

Ready for some feline fun? 🐾✨
